1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Abu Samh said:"I was a servant of the Prophet, and Hasan and Husain was brought to him and (the infant) urinated on his chest. They wanted to wash it, but the Messenger of Allah said: 'Sprinkle water on it, for the urine of a girl should be washed, but the urine of a boy should be sprinkled over with water

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي بَوْلِ الصَّبِيِّ الَّذِي لَمْ يَطْعَمْ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning the urine of an infant boy who is not yet eating solid food
